alert.note: Alert for Trimble (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 9:27AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Harrison, central Jefferson, Clark, Floyd, southeastern Scott, Oldham, Trimble, northwestern Henry and northwestern Jefferson Counties through 1000 AM EST... At 927 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Albany, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Jeffersonville and Mockingbird Valley around 930 AM EST. Prospect, Barbourmeade, Northfield, Green Spring, Spring Valley, Brownsboro Farm, Glenview, Riverwood, Glenview Hills and Glenview Manor around 935 AM EST. La Grange around 945 AM EST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Bedford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
